Text:
good quality and nice seeds!
but you cant open with divx player (too slow and no sound)
you're better with windows media player and shark007's codecs

i downloaded this but there weren't any subtitles.
Audio and Video were good only problem is there are no subtitles.

Subs Included (English - Jap)
I had problems with VLC
Worked fine with WMP and shark007's codecs as el_kricket suggested

Thanks a lot mate, works as a charm :D

To ALWAYS being able to watch all movies out there, get "K-lite codec pack" and player of choice.I use PotPlayer as it's AWESOME and the successor of  KMPlayer. I have never had any problem what so ever watching any movie on my PC at least since I got K-lite. Happy hunting!
